ability_texts.imp: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
ability_texts.baron: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]
ability_texts.scarlet_woman: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count)
ability_texts.spy: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
ability_texts.poisoner: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
ability_texts.butler: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.
ability_texts.drunk: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.
ability_texts.recluse: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.
ability_texts.saint: If you die by execution, your team loses.
ability_texts.mayor: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.
ability_texts.soldier: You are safe from the Demon.
ability_texts.slayer: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.
ability_texts.virgin: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.
ability_texts.ravenkeeper: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.
ability_texts.monk: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.
ability_texts.undertaker: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.
ability_texts.fortune_teller: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.
ability_texts.empath: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.
ability_texts.chef: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.
ability_texts.investigator: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.
ability_texts.librarian: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)
ability_texts.washerwoman: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.
